availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Peter Miller (Maysville, Kentucky, coffee house owner)

body.p: Maysville, Kentucky, coffee house owner. Native of Germany. Married to Sarah Stevens Miller. Father of Henry Miller, Sarah Miller, Sally Miller, Peter Miller, and Frederick Miller. Laborer in Mason County, Kentucky in 1850. Coffee house owner in Mason County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Mason County, District 1, p. 30A.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Mason County, Maysville, Ward 3, p. 341.
Kentucky Death Certificates, 1911-1965, Kentucky Office of Vital Statistics, KDLA, Frankfort, KY, File #15174.
